title: jeff- champion concept
body:
Jeff
the scared gunman.
Role marksman 
secondary bruiser
zaun

Jeff is a quadruple amputee who has been augmented into an assassin, jeff has 2 below the knee leg amputations, 1 full arm amputation and one below the elbow, he has been augment with bionic limbs, including a sling bow and hand on one arm and a discthrowing slingshot/5 shot bolt cannon on the other.jeffs leg prosthetics are a pair of smooth spikes which he pierces into the dirt.
Jeff is pale,wears a mask,a pair of ragged shorts, has no armour and is covered in scars.
Lore- unfinished
Abilities.

Passive – plan b - when jeff drops below 35% health he has the option of ditching his arms shedding some wight( a small circle will appear to jeffs back when he hits 35% of his current health and will remain there like bards e) when jeff enters the circle he drops his arms while dashing back also giving him a 45% speed boost for 2 seconds.
 jeff cannot attack until he rearms by going back over his arm-arments he dropped or going back to base to re-arm. 50 seconds cd, if an enemy champion stays in the circle for 1.5 secs it will be destroyed

Q-Twisted metal - 75 mana 12 second cd
jeff fires a spinning metal disc with a bomb attached out in a line which if it reach’s the end of the line it explodes in a circle radius dealing 90/120/150/200/250(+.3ad), can be manually detonated like anivias q. if it hits an enemy directly before it detonates, it rips through then explodes on the other side sending out shrapnel in a cone dealing extra magic damage to extra targets(excludes the first target)

W-Zaun patented range extender- 80 mana- 18 seconds cooldown
Passive- jeff gains range of 2% on auto attacks and 1% on abilities per lvl.
Active- jeff extends his range on auto attacks by 15% and abilities by 5% for 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 seconds.

E- (unanmed)
Passive – gains 1 bolt every 8/7/6/5/4 seconds, bolt growth is increased every 1 lvl and max’s at 10 stacks 

Active -cost 1 bolt and 20 mana, fires a bolt from a sling bow mounted on his arm in a line dealing damage 15/25/35/45/60(+.4 ad). 4/3.5/3/2.5/2 seconds cooldown.

R ultimate - Reign of steel – 100/90/75 second cd, 100 mana + 5 bolts
Jeff manually locks on an enemy target with a laser guided by the curser by focusing on them for a total of 2 seconds within a 5 second period, locking them for 5/6/7.5 second,while laser guiding jeff is free to move around.
 jeff then channels for .75 seconds and fires 5 bolts into the air in over a period of 2 seconds(one every .4 seconds) which rain down on enemy champions dealing 30/45/60(+.5 ad). If jeff lands all 5 bolts,The last bolt will critically strike.
If jeff cannot lock within a 5 second period half his cd will be refunded. champions can break the lock by going out of range(like illoais ability).

rough draft of a champ idea i made while im taking some time off lol,just posting to see what people think of the idea so far. Final edit including extensive lore and artwork coming at a later date, so if some cuck comments on grammar i wont respond, although criticism about the actual champion concept very welcome.
